title: What are some great slow hindi songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a lot of good songs , but for obvious reasons I can’t list all of them. So here is a list of 20 slow paced songs. This question requires recent songs but I couldn’t resist myself to mentioning some old songs. Here you go Enjoy!!! 1.Phir Mohabbat Karne Chala Hai Tu ( Murder 2 ) Singer- Arijit singh , Mohammed Irfan Music - Mithoon  2. Dil Kyu Ye Mera Shor Kre (Kites) Singer - KK Music- Rajesh Roshan  3. Do Dil Mil Rhe Hain (Pardes) Singer-Kumar Sanu Music- Nadeem-Shravan  4. Sanam Teri Kasam Title Track Singer - Ankit Tiwari, Palak Muchhal Music - Himesh Reshammyia  5.Mere Hamsafar Recreated Version (All Is Well) Singer - Tulsi Kumar , Mithoon Music - Mithoon , Anand Milind (Originally)  6. Chura Liya Hai Tumne Jo Dil Ko (Yaadon Ki Baraat) Singer- Asha Bhosle , Mohammed Rafi Music-RD Burman  7. Khuda Jane (Bachma Ae Haseeno) Singer - KK, Shilpa Rao Music- Vishal -Shekhar  8. Hawayein (Jab Harry Met Sejal) Singer -Arijit Singh Music - Pritam  9.Zahanaseeb (Hasee To Phasee) Singer- Chinmayi sripaada , Shekhar Ravjiani Music- Vishal- Shekhar  10.Ik Yaad Purani Singer- Tulsi Kumar, Jashan Singh Music-Jaidev Kumar, Toshi , Sharib  11.Jeena Jeena (Badlapur) Singer - Atif Aslam Music- Sachin- Jigar  12.Oh Kyu Ni Jaan ske Singer- Ninja Music- Goldboy  13.Tune Jo Na Kaha (New York) Singer- Mohit Chauhan Music- Pritam  14.Bol Na Halke Halke (Jhoom Barabar Jhoom) Singer- Rahat Fateh Ali Khan , Mahalaxmi Iyer Music- Shankar - Ehsaan- Loy  15. Jeevan Se Bhari Teri Ankhein (Safar) Singer- Kishore Kumar Music- Kalyanji- Anandji  16.Abhie Na Jao Chhodkar (Hum Dono) Singer-Mohammed Rafi, Asha Bhosle Music- Jaidev  17. Lamha Lamha (Gangster) Singer- Abhijeet, Sunidhi Chauhan Music- Pritam  18. Awarapan Banjarapan (Jism) Singer- KK Music - MM Kareem  19. Hey Shona ( Ta Ra Rum Pum) Singer- Shaan, Sunidhi Chauhan Music- Vishal- Shekhar  20. Abhie Mujh Mein Kahin (Agneepath-2012) Singer- Soni Nigam Music- Ajay-Atul  Hope you like it.

Some of the latest songs (2013) Aashiqui 2 - almost all songsLootera - Sawaar LoonLootera - Ankahee Lootera - Shikayatein Lootera - Zinda Nautanki Saala - Mera Mann Kehne LagaMurder 3 - Teri Jhuki NazarMurder 3 - Hum Jee Lenge Apart from that, in last 4-5 years some of the songs I found amazing are The Dirty Picture - Ishq Sufiyana (Male)Talaash - Jee Le ZaraaTalaash - Laakh Duniya KaheShanghai - KhudaayaLondon Paris New York - Thehree Si ZindagiLondon Paris New York - Voh Dekhnay MeinKahaani - KahaaniJannat 2 - Tu Hi MeraJannat 2 - Rab Ka ShukranaJannat 2 - Sang Hoon TereEkk Deewana Tha - HosannaEkk Mai aur ek tu - AahateinBarfi! - Main Kya KaroonBarfi! - AashiyanBarfi! - Phir Le Aya Dil (Reprise)Agneepath - Abhi Mujh Mein KahinKites - Zindagi Do Pal KiKites - Tum Bhi Ho WahiKites - Dil Kyun Yeh MeraTanu Weds Manu - Yun HiDil to Bacha hai Ji - Tere BinGuzaarish - Tera ZikrGuzaarish - Sau Gram ZindagiGuzaarish - Jaane kiske khwaabGuzaarish - Keh na SakuAnjaana Anjaani - Tujhe Bhula DiyaOnce Upon a Time in Mumbai - Pee LoonCrook - Tujhi MeinMurder 2 - Phir MohabbatMurder 2 - Hale DilZindagi Na Milegi Dobara - All Songs!Dum Maaro Dum - Te Amo (Duet)Dum Maaro Dum - Jiyein KyunI Hate Luv Stories - Bin TereI hate luv Stories - Sadka HuaLafangey Parindey - Man LafangaLafangey Parindey - Nain ParindeyLife in a Metro - AlvidaTrain - Beete LamheJaane tu ya Jaane naa - Kahin to Hogi wohJaane tu ya Jaane naa - kabhi Kabhi AditiKal ho na ho - title trackRang De basanti - Khoon ChalaFashion - Kuch KhasLife in a Metro - O meri jaan Tum Mile - Tu hi HaqeeqatTum Mile - O Meri JaanTum Mile - Dil IbadatNew York - Tune Jo Naa KahaWake Up Sid! - IktaraVeer Zara - do palVeer Zara - Main Yaha HoonVeer Zara - Tere LiyeAjab Prem ki Gazab Kahaani - Tu jaane naRehna hai Tere dil Main - Such Keh Rah HaiRehna hai Tere dil Main - Dil ko tumse pyaarRang de Basanti - Luka chuppiRang de Basanti - tu bin bataye
